attributes.action: Offer asylum and help to the South African farmers
attributes.background: A law has been passed in South Africa encouraging Black South Africans to take farms from White farmers by any means necessary.Murder,Rape,Torture of the farmers and their families is rife.Britain should offer help and asylum to these people.The mainstream media has blacked out coverage

rejection.details:
People can already claim asylum if they have left their country and are unable to go back because they fear persecution.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/claim-asylum
